scripts.db: dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold "Integrated Security=SSPI;Persist Security Info=False;Initial Catalog=DistribuidoraDB;Data Source=localhost\SQLEXPRESS;Encrypt=False" "Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer" --context-dir "Negocio\entidades" --output-dir "Negocio\entidades" --use-database-names --no-pluralize  --force --no-build
